  â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€ â–€ â–€    â–ˆ   â–ˆ â–ˆâ–„â–„â–„â–ˆ â–ˆâ–„â–„â–„â–€ â–ˆâ–„â–„â–„â–€ â–ˆâ–„â–„â–„â–€   â–€ â–€ â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€â–€


  A rebellion has taken place at a remote military base on  Mars.  The
  facility specialized in the research and development  of  autonomous
  weaponized  robots. The  most advanced  robots were  able  to  seize
  control of the entire base. All military and civilian  personnel are
  presumed killed in action. Your mission is  to retake  the  base  by
  force. You must eliminate the leaders of the rebel army  and destroy
  anything that stands in your way.

  For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/405440/
